name: Remnant's Last Journey
description:
You take the role of a dead soldier now lost in a beautiful wasteland where the only way to advance is making use of your pole-vaulting skills.

Grab the flag and rescue the souls of your mates in this short and sweet puzzle platformer!

Use the arrow keys to move and WASD to control your flag.

A game by Thaniel with help from Alice. Music by Popfan and Medi. Playtesting by Rex.

Part of the Care Package Bundle, get 7 wholesome games for $7!
